name: Vesha
description:
In the beginning... there was nothing. Build you universe as Vesha, the ancient dragon.

This build has a fair bit of bugs, primarily due to some technical issues that I didn't have time to fix because of the size of them. The core gameplay is still there though and I really enjoyed making this.

Also I built for linux but I'm currently unable to test, so fair warning that version may be completely broken while it works on mac and PC
